casebody.data:
Coburn SAWYER, James Michael Clampitt, June Hagman, Kurt Hagman, David Sawyer, Plaintiff,
v.
The ESTATE OF John SAWYER, Mary S. Carter, Executrix, and Mary S. Carter, individually, Defendant. No. COA15-1142. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. July 19, 2016.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Affirmed in Part and Reversed in Part.
